messages.content: I need to find the top news articles about artificial intelligence today. Can you perform a search using DuckDuckGo and provide me with the results?

arguments.query: top news about artificial intelligence today
top news about artificial intelligence today

messages.content: Here are the top news articles about artificial intelligence from DuckDuckGo:

tools.name: search_duckduckgo
tools.description: Perform a search on DuckDuckGo and retrieve the results.

format.description: The format in which to return the results.

no_redirect.description: Whether to prevent redirection to external websites.

no_html.description: Whether to exclude HTML from the results.

tools.name: get_related_topics
tools.description: Retrieve related topics for a given search query from DuckDuckGo.

query.description: The search query string to find related topics for.

format.description: The format in which to return the related topics.

tools.name: get_instant_answer
tools.description: Get an instant answer for a given search query from DuckDuckGo.

query.description: The search query string to get an instant answer for.

format.description: The format in which to return the instant answer.

skip_disambig.description: Whether to skip disambiguation of the query.
